[OpenGL Classes]

Detailed Description

A utility class for accumulating images from multiple OpenGL renders in software.

void DzOGLAccumulator::accumulate ( float  multiplier  ) 

Adds the color buffer from the current OpenGL context to a software accumulation buffer.

multiplier The multiplier to use in the accumulation

QImage DzOGLAccumulator::getImage (  ) 

Draws the accumulation buffer to a QImage and returns it.
